channel.title: Version 1.0.0 on Fore Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Version 1.0.0 on Fore Documentation

item.title: Architecture
item.description: Architecture This chapter gives some insights into the inner workings of Fore. Fore is build as a classical MVC architecture. Model -> <fx-model> Element View -> Fore UI Elements Controller -> Fore Action Elements

item.title: Fore
item.description: Documentation fore - ‘situated in front of something else’ - Merriam Webster Descriptive user interfaces in pure HTML.
